channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes along one stretch of road, deep enough to damage tyres. You have to drive like youâ€™re drunk to avoid them all, 22nd December
item.description:
They start outside Hayden Road Allotments and continue until the junction for Pilgrove Way
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham

item.title: Massive Pothole, 22nd December
item.description:
Between Badgeworth and Shurdington, just as you go round the bend. On the left side of the road but near the middle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: This crossing over the drainage ditch is dangerous and confusing. It should be taken away as there is a safer one just a few meters further to the left. Problem Identified 22-12-2025. The damaged stile is one field further over the drainage along the footpath., 22nd December
item.description:
Drainage crossing: Perch-insolvent-casually Stile damage: decorate-overheard-furnish

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
